title: BASF 's planned capital expenditure by region 2020 to 2024
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Region, and a y axis representing Share of capital expenditure.
The highest category is found at Asia_Pacific where Share of capital expenditure is 41.0.
The lowest category is found at South_America_Africa_Middle_East where Share of capital expenditure is 1.0.
gold: This statistic shows BASF 's planned capital expenditure between 2020 and 2024 , by region . In that period , some 19 percent of the company 's planned capital expenditure are expected to be spent in North America .
